channel.title: Homes on Guy Abel
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Guy Abel

item.description: Biography I am an applied statistician based at the Asian Demographic Research Institute and IIASA. I am also a Professor in the School of Sociology and Political Science at Shanghai University. Previously I worked at the Vienna Institute of Demography, the ESRC Centre for Population Change and S3RI at the University of Southampton. My day-to-day research covers estimating migration and applying statistical methods to better forecast components of population change.
